alarms.name: Lightning Detection
alarms.description: Alert on any lightning strike detected

channels.template: ⚡ LIGHTNING DETECTED! Strike count: {{lightning_count}}, Distance: {{lightning_distance}}km at {{timestamp}}

alarms.name: Lightning Approaching
alarms.description: Alert when lightning gets closer (distance decreasing)

alarms.name: Storm Intensifying
alarms.description: Alert when rain OR wind increases

channels.template: 🌪️ Storm intensifying! Rain: {{rain_rate}}mm/hr, Wind gusts: {{wind_gust}}m/s at {{timestamp}}

alarms.name: Pressure Dropping
alarms.description: Alert when barometric pressure falls (storm approaching)

channels.template: 📉 Pressure dropping! Current: {{pressure}}mb (falling) - Storm may be approaching at {{timestamp}}

alarms.name: Severe Weather Conditions
alarms.description: Complex storm detection with multiple change indicators

channels.template: ⚠️ SEVERE WEATHER! Lightning: {{lightning_count}} strikes at {{lightning_distance}}km, Wind: {{wind_gust}}m/s at {{timestamp}}

alarms.name: Heat Index Rising
alarms.description: Alert when temperature is high AND humidity is increasing

channels.template: 🌡️ Dangerous heat building! Temp: {{temperature_f}}°F with {{humidity}}% humidity (rising) at {{timestamp}}
💨 Wind strengthening! Gusts now {{wind_gust}}m/s ({{wind_gust_mph}}mph) and increasing at {{timestamp}}

alarms.name: UV Index Rising
alarms.description: Alert when UV index increases to dangerous levels

channels.template: ☀️ UV index rising to dangerous levels! Current UV: {{uv}} (very high) at {{timestamp}}
🥶 Temperature dropping rapidly! Now {{temperature_f}}°F ({{temperature}}°C) and falling at {{timestamp}}
